snippet.title: Septic Arthritis
snippet.description: Septic arthritis, or infectious arthritis, is infection of one or more joints by bacteria, viruses, or fungi. Symptoms and signs...arthritis is infection of one or more joints by microorganisms.

snippet.title: Synovial sarcoma
snippet.description: Synovial sarcoma: A malignant tumor of soft tissue that arises near, but not in, a joint. Synovial sarcomas most often occur in adolescents or young adults, are typically slow-growing, and may escape.

snippet.title: Sarcoma, synovial
snippet.description: Sarcoma, synovial: A malignant tumor of soft tissue that arises near, but not in, a joint. Synovial sarcomas most often occur in adolescents or young adults, are typically slow-growing, and may escape...

snippet.title: Osteochondromatosis, synovial
snippet.description: Osteochondromatosis, synovial: A disorder of a joint featuring a change of the normal joint lining (synovium) tissue's cellular structure to form bone-cartilage tissue. Synovial osteochondromatosis is...

snippet.title: Synovial chondromatosis
snippet.description: Synovial chondromatosis: A disorder of a joint featuring a change of the normal joint lining (synovium) tissue's cellular structure to form cartilage tissue. Synovial chondromatosis is rare...
